title: Four Songs (Alexi Murdoch EP)
text:
Four Songs is the debut EP of London-born <a href="Alexi%20Murdoch">Alexi Murdoch</a>. It was released in November 2002.
Uses in other media.
The song "<a href="Orange%20Sky%20%28song%29">Orange Sky</a>" has been featured in the television shows "<a href="Prison%20Break">Prison Break</a>" (the episode "English, Fitz or Percy"), "<a href="The%20O.C.">The O.C.</a>" (and its soundtrack album "Music From The O.C. Mix 1"), "<a href="Dawson%27s%20Creek">Dawson's Creek</a>", and in the film "<a href="Garden%20State%20%28film%29">Garden State</a>".
"Blue Mind" was also featured in "Dawson's Creek".
